title: Enchanting Emerald and Pearl Haram Set: A Touch of Traditional Elegance
materials: Cubic Zirconia. Gold is crafted with a lustrous Hyderabadi Polish for enduring shine.
features: This exquisite necklace features a delicate, modern Haaram design with alternating Emerald and CZ-studded floral motifs. Lustrous pearls are suspended from each motif, adding a touch of classic charm. The matching Jhumka studs echo the necklace's design, completing the set with understated elegance. The intricate setting showcases meticulous craftsmanship.
colors: and pristine white pearls create a captivating and harmonious color palette.
occasions: and contemporary celebrations. Its versatility makes it a stunning addition to any special occasion attire.
description: This Haaram set seamlessly blends traditional South Indian aesthetics with modern design sensibilities. The high-quality emeralds and pearls exude sophistication, while the durable gold setting ensures lasting beauty. It's a timeless investment piece that can be treasured for generations. Symbolizes prosperity, purity, and enduring love.
